title: T206 Hall of Famers for sale.
author: Brian Van Horn

posts.post_title: T206 Hall of Famers for sale.
posts.post_content:
1909 T206 Brown (Chicago down shirt) with Sovereign back-$175.00
1909 T206 Jennings (both hands) (wrinkle in belt on right side and stain on back-$110.00
1909 T206 Joss (pitching) with Sweet Caporal back (wear top left corner)-$130.00
1909 T206 Lajoie (Batting)-listening to offers. There is a little wrinkle in the lower right just along the bottom of the sleeve, but not at the cuff of the sleeve. (sold)

S/h is an additional $7.50 (certified mail). If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family.
